title: Papa John's Pizza Virgin: A Conversation with Colin
description:
In a laid back conversation, Colin has his first Papa John's pizza. 

Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

transcript_chunks.text: all right Colin you're about to have your first Papa John's Pizza of all time correct you've seen it on TV a lot yeah I haven't and uh they're in the neighborhood now so they're in the neighborhood all right so crack open and let me see what you want here let me get rid of we got some peppers and got a whole they they come with a lot of Acra mons are you aware of everything you're going to get in this box I don't know let's see okay okay okay looks a little bit like a Domino's Pizza uh what they got pepperi yeah okay well we're not going we don't know what to do with that uh garlic no we've been warned about the garlic butter um probably not going to do anything with that either though for your crush for my crotch crust crust sorry I was eating your pepperi so let's see here what's going nothing's really happening we' just dated the video now everybody knows when this was filmed just like all the other conversations with Colin those were all filmed on different days I'm eating it right

really happening we' just dated the video now everybody knows when this was filmed just like all the other conversations with Colin those were all filmed on different days I'm eating it right yep okay your impressions okay that's good mhm all right good you're happy with your purchase um yeah a little expensive yeah um probably just go with Pascal's next time all right Pascal's right here in San Francisco California sorry NFL I didn't get your Express written consent and I don't give a [ __ ] see old Jess
